resources.string: Enter the address to connect to
To learn more take a look at our guide in the Help area
Description (Optional). By default it\'s Content Services
This file format isn\'t supported. You need to install an app that can read it.
The Like/Unlike tag for this content couldn\'t be retrieved.

Alfresco is the open platform for business-critical content management and collaboration.

Alfresco Content Services mobile app was designed and developed by Alfresco Software, Inc. and connects to Alfresco Content Services in the Cloud, Alfresco Content Services and Alfresco Community Edition (versions 3.4.8 and above) to provide safe access to your corporate files on the go.

This mobile application connects using your Alfresco Content Services login credentials (over HTTP or HTTPS), and manages access based on your permissions.
Do you want to share this as an attachment or a clickable link?

resources.string:
Data protection is on.

If you delete this account your content will be unprotected.

Are you sure you want to delete "%s"?
\"%s\" has been modified. Do you want to upload this new version?
You don\'t have a voice recorder on this device
Can\'t complete the capturing of this information
This name is already in use.
You don\'t have an app that will create this file type.
SD card must be accessible for this operation
Login to an Alfresco Content Services account first

Data protection is available.
Do you want to turn it on?

All content downloaded from Alfresco Content Services accounts will be encrypted and can only be viewed in the Alfresco Content Services app.

Do you want to protect downloaded content?

All content downloaded from Alfresco Content Services accounts will be encrypted and can only be viewed in the Alfresco Content Services app.

Do you want to unprotect downloaded content?

This will be applied to all content you\'ve downloaded from Alfresco Content Services.
Cancel your request to join site %s
Your request to join \"%s\" has been cancelled.
A problem prevented you from joining the site \"%s\".
A problem prevented you from leaving the site \"%s\".
A problem prevented you from favoriting the site \"%s\".
A problem prevented you from unfavoriting the site \"%s\".
SSL certificate validation has been turned off.
Your IT Team require you to use Passcode protection.
Erase all Alfresco Content Services data from this device after 10 failed passcode attempts
All local data has been removed.
Data protection makes content downloaded from this app to be readable only in the Alfresco Content Services app. (Enterprise customers only)
Rate this app on Google Play
Select which tabs are available on your menu.
Your IT Team has turned off this feature.
To help us improve this app, we collect anonymous technical diagnostic data. Deselect if preferred.
Favorite info for this content couldn\'t be retrieved.
Do you want to automatically keep your favorite content in sync with this device?

Do you want to turn off sync?

All synced content will be deleted from your device.

You\'ve unsynced %s since you started editing it.
Sync your edited version to the server or Save it to your \"Downloads\" folder.
%s has been deleted on the server but a copy has been saved in your \"Downloads\" folder.
You don\'t have the required permission to upload your edited version of %s. You can Save it to your \"Downloads\" folder, or Overwrite it with the server version which will discard your edits.
You can view and edit your synced files when you\'re offline
You can now sync different files on different devices. Just find a file and sync it!
View and edit your synced files when you\'re offline. When you\'re back online they\'ll automatically sync.
What about the files I already favorited?
No problem, they\'re all still synced!
When you favorite files from now on, they\'ll be in your Favorites tab, but you need to sync them if you want offline access.
Where do I find synced files?
You can find all your synced files in the new Synced Content view!

You\'re about to sync %s over a carrier connection.

Would you like to continue?

You\'re trying to sync %1$s, only %2$s are available.

You need to free some space in your device or unsync content.

You\'re about to sync %1$s, only %2$s remain on your device.

Would you like to continue?

All content downloaded from Alfresco Content Services accounts will be encrypted, and can only be viewed from within the Alfresco Content Services app.
Displays a list of most important local folders available inside the device.
Displays files local to the client.
Displays the details of a file.
Displays the details of a folder or file.
Displays a folder from the repository.
Displays a list of nodes based on a query.
Displays list of favorite files and folders.
Displays activities stream for a specific user.
Displays activities stream for a specific site.
Displays a search view for users with the matching keywords.
Displays list of members for a specific site.

Displays the profile for the specified username.

Displays a folder retrieved by its nodeRef
Displays the document library folder associated to the specified site
